name: MyBuddyGard
0:
”Alexa, open My Buddy Gard”
”Alexa, ask My Buddy Gard for the latest update”
”Alexa, start My Buddy Gard”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my buddy gard
des: Listen to the latest blogs posts from My Buddy Gard. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
